translations.tbzZM0HR7Te: Add your WhatsApp number so that people can send you messages. Next, we'll send you a WhatsApp message with a code.
translations.6_Q6flTZ06d: If you have an existing WhatsApp Business account, enter its number here.
translations.q7ogLVyM8jI: We're having trouble sending your code. Please check your number and try again.
translations.P95GTPgzczu: You will get more people sending you messages and comments if you change your goal to get more WhatsApp messages.
translations.tdIJse5zGTI: You will get more {link to our people metrics explanation} sending you messages and comments if you change your goal to get more engagement.
translations.sYfNGvpj9iX: You will get more people sending you messages and comments if you change your goal to get more video views.
translations.vljmjgyB8FR: You will get more people sending you messages and comments if you change your goal to get more messages.
translations.Rnb2vsaJBPL: Reach people likely to contact your business and build lasting customer relationships with the {=m1} goal.
translations.SFrj2apbfOA: Change your goal to start new conversations
translations.ept3KImtFuv: Connect your reel to a video
translations.EuYoAyBcsxi: People can watch one of your videos directly from your reel.
translations.oXBs6M-3uI7: You can continue with the existing reel or go back and trim it to make it yours.
translations.zkLKAAdSLMw: Post is processing. Create a reel from your video and connect them.
translations.JyU8cE93cZa: Create a reel from your video
translations.lFjvq0WWhDr: Use your reel as a trailer, so that people can discover and watch your full video.
translations.xcK21eSeHmZ: You can increase your reach and potentially start earning.
translations.EbGGTrS5uoC: Post two content formats in a few steps.
translations.Ai98TqKTPq_: The post with the most 1-Minute Video Views within 30 minutes will be the top performing post. After your test ends, the top performing post will be distributed to future audiences. You can end your test before the time limit is reached via the {link to post testing tab}
translations.iXjV4fHa7ZN: Post Testing Tool in Creator Studio.
translations.vLxI2ALFMU0: There was an error while generating thumbnails. Please try again later.
translations.0Bwhvs8C3Tq: Choose from the suggested thumbnails or upload your own images for testing.
translations.cJbffwwvLnE: Choose one of these suggested images to show before your video starts playing.
translations.TeGZpMY0OXt: Upload a high resolution image that best represents your video.
translations.VZ0lIshAgFV: Choose a still frame from your video to show before it starts playing.
translations.GjUMcWAXO5B: Create Full Test in Post Testing
translations.u6cKN4wvGNO: This option is unavailable for title testing. If you want to enable this feature remove the additional titles from this video post.
translations.6h6hSeTxWwB: You can create full tests to test multiple variants and set different metric goals in the {link to post testing tab}
translations.yUjNJFZdvIa: This option is unavailable for title testing. If you want to enable this feature remove the additional titles from this video post.
translations.vbm1Cwm1pPu: Your test will run for 30 minutes and measure 1-minute views. The post with the most 1-minute views is considered the winner and it will be distributed to future audiences.

nWmvvPd_UHR.1-minute views: Your test will run for 30 minutes and measure 1-minute views. The post with the most 1-minute views is considered the winner and it will be distributed to future audiences.
nWmvvPd_UHR.reactions: Your test will run for 30 minutes and measure reactions. The post with the most reactions is considered the winner, and it will be distributed to future audiences.
